meanings.sent1: The horse was hinnying loudly in the field.
meanings.sent2: I heard the horse hinnying from afar.
meanings.sent3: The horse started hinnying when it saw its favorite treat.
meanings.sent4: The sound of hinnying echoed through the barn.
meanings.sent5: The hinnying of the horse was a familiar sound on the farm.

meanings.definition: The characteristic cry of a horse.
meanings.sent1: I recognized the hinnying of the horse in the distance.
meanings.sent2: The hinnying of the mare was music to my ears.
meanings.sent3: The comical hinnying of the foal made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The hinnying of the horse was like a melody in the quiet countryside.
meanings.sent5: The loud hinnying of the stallion could be heard throughout the stables.
